subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: If the downward viewership pattern continues through the Tour de France's end, Lance Armstrong's impact will exceed what happened to the N.B.A. finals after Michael Jordan's first two retirements.
snippet: If the downward viewership pattern continues through the Tour de France's end, Lance Armstrong's impact will exceed what happened to the N.B.A. finals after Michael Jordan's first two retirements.
